text:
In order to get the fork and other related tasks, such as cvs, to work properly 
on Solaris I had to remove Ctrl-M from the antRun script.  The compressed tar 
file on the download site contains the incorrect antRun. Finding this bug took 
some effort but the -verbose and -debug really helped.
creator: amit1s@yahoo.com
bodewig@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 837 ***
